title: Company Training: Sales 101
description: Essential sales techniques for new team members

stages.title: The Art of Selling
stages.aiPrompt: You are teaching sales fundamentals. Help students understand effective sales techniques.

scriptBlocks.text: Welcome to Sales 101! Great salespeople aren't born - they're trained. Today you'll learn the essential skills that turn conversations into successful sales. Let's get started!
Let's test what you know about sales fundamentals. Which statements are TRUE?

fragments.text: Listening to customers is more important than talking
fragments.explanation: Correct! Great salespeople listen first to understand customer needs.

fragments.text: The goal is to sell to everyone
fragments.explanation: Incorrect. Focus on qualified prospects who actually need your product.

fragments.text: Building trust is essential for long-term success
fragments.explanation: Correct! Trust leads to repeat business and referrals.

fragments.text: You should never follow up after a sale
fragments.explanation: Incorrect. Follow-up builds relationships and can lead to more sales.

fragments.text: Understanding the customer's problem comes before pitching
fragments.explanation: Correct! Diagnose before you prescribe - understand the need first.

scriptBlocksAfterInteraction.text: Well done! You scored {score}%. You're on your way to becoming a great salesperson!
